description: Try our easy to follow Smashed Egg & Veggie Wrap + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kids wrap,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Budget,Halal,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Smashed Egg & Veggie Wrap + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g tub lowfat passionfruit yoghurt, for snack

recipeInstructions.text: Mash egg with Greekstyle yoghurt in a bowl. Spread egg mixture over wrap. Top with carrot and lettuce. Wrap to enclose. Pack into lunch box.
Snack 1: Place tomatoes and celery stalk in an airtight container.
Snack 2: Place yoghurt in an airtight container.
